Class LibraryController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<LibraryView>
musicApp.controllers.SongContainerController<LibraryView>
musicApp.controllers.LibraryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LibraryView.LibraryViewListener, SongContainerView.SongContainerViewListener
public class LibraryController extends SongContainerController<LibraryView> implements LibraryView.LibraryViewListener
The controller for the Main Library view.

      Retrieves the index of a given song in the music library.
      Parameters:
      song - The Song object whose index is to be found.
      Returns:

    • toggleFavorites

      public void toggleFavorites(Song song)
      Toggle the favorites status of a song. If the song is already a favorite, it will be removed from the favorites. If the song is not a favorite, it will be added to the favorites.
      Parameters:
      song - the song
